questions: Where is the Networking and Linkages Office?
Where to locate the Networking and Linkages Office?
Where to find the Networking and Linkages Office?
Location of Networking and Linkages Office
answers: The Networking and Linkages Office is located at the ground floor of the Don Rodolfo T. Lizares, Sr Building also known as the main building. It is facing the colege library and is located along the Human Resource Department. Here's an image of the Networking and Linkages Office:
